categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Pratt was a Human male sergeant in the Imperial Army of the reconstituted Sith Empire. He was stationed on the planet Alderaan. A junior officer in Lieutenant Grol's unit, after Grol's death he clashed with Sergeant Tegan over who would assume command of the unit and continue their mission to extract Padrus Organa from House Alde.
